channel.title: Comments on: Instructions
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: I have never been clever in the traditional sense...those riddles about south facing windows and polar bears and doors leading to the center of the labryrinth have always escaped me. However, it could be argued that I'm intrigued rather than just bored. I hate being the first one to play because the insecure side of me says, what if I'm not getting it and being dumb and then everyone can see how dumb I am... but I guess I have never been prudent either, so here goes...
item.content:encoded: I have never been clever in the traditional sense…those riddles about south facing windows and polar bears and doors leading to the center of the labryrinth have always escaped me. However, it could be argued that I’m intrigued rather than just bored. I hate being the first one to play because the insecure side of me says, what if I’m not getting it and being dumb and then everyone can see how dumb I am… but I guess I have never been prudent either, so here goes…
